name: Customer Response Due Date
title: CRDD
definition: Identifies the date on which the provider expects a response from the customer regarding this Clarification/Notification Request.

validEntry.description: Two Digit Month (01-12) Two Digit Century (00-99)
Two Digit Day (01-31) Two Digit Year (00-99)
Two Digit Century (00-99) Two Digit Month (01-12)
Two Digit Year (00-99) Two Digit Day (01-31)

usageNotes: Required when the SUPR field is populated, otherwise optional.
